Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers

Class AthenaController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers.GodController
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers.AthenaController
public class AthenaController
extends GodController
Extension of the GodController class that modifies the turn according to Athena's God Power.

  • Method Details

    • generateCard

      public Card generateCard()
      Sets all the attributes of the God Card Athena to their actual values.
      Specified by:
      generateCard in class GodController
      Returns:
      the complete Card

    • movePhase

      void movePhase() throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException, IOExceptionFromController
      Handles the moving phase of the turn, adding a Modifier if the Worker moved up on this turn. Calls displayMove with a non-null Card parameter if the Athena God Power was used.
      Overrides:
      movePhase in class GodController
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when an exception related to ObjectOutputStream and ObjectInputStream occurs
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when the thread handling the communication is waiting and it is interrupted before or during its activity
      IOExceptionFromController - when an IOException from a specific PlayerController occurs

    • limitMoves

      java.util.ArrayList<Cell> limitMoves​(Cell workerPosition, java.util.ArrayList<Cell> possibleMoves)
      Applies Athena God Power. Gets an ArrayList containing all the Cells where an opponent Worker can move and creates another ArrayList, removing from the first one all the Cells that require a move up.
      Overrides:
      limitMoves in class GodController
      Parameters:
      workerPosition - the position of the Worker
      possibleMoves - all the Cells where the Worker can move, considering only the game restrictions
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all the Cells where the Worker is actually able to move
